## LightModel.finalComposite() method

Calculates the final color of current fragment by composing individual light contribution

**Signature:**

```typescript
finalComposite(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | The shader scope |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The final fragment color
